name: Many Moons
description:
Many Moons make ONE moon! A new game from the designer of PathPix, Many Moons is an original brain game, a matching game with super simple rules and challenging puzzles.

Use lunar logic! Merge matching moonlets until there is only one moon left, and watch the moon rise!

SIMPLE RULES - COMPLEX PUZZLES
---Start with a board full of colored moons.
---Push matching moons together.
---When two matching moons merge they make a bigger moon of a different color.
---Combine ALL of the moons to make ONE big moon.

FEATURES:
---25 free puzzles in the Intro puzzle pack - many more puzzle packs available.
---Puzzles range in size from 6 to 80 moons.
---Graduated difficulty, from very easy to super hard.
---Not sure if you are on the right track? Ask the board check how you are doing.
---Numbers optional.
---Game Center and iCloud enabled.

TIPS
---Since moons always get bigger when they join, start with the smallest moons and work your way up.
---Every move can be made in two directions. It usually helps to pick the way that will put the new moon within sight of as many matching moons as possible.
---There are many ways to solve each puzzle, so don't give up!
